chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: Wherefore, holy brethren, partakers of the heavenly calling, consider the Apostle and High Priest of our profession, Christ Jesus;
items.plainText: Wherefore, holy brethren, partakers of the heavenly calling, consider the Apostle and High Priest of our profession, Christ Jesus;

items.text: Who was faithful to him that appointed him, as also Moses was faithful in all his house.
items.plainText: Who was faithful to him that appointed him, as also Moses was faithful in all his house.

items.text: For this man was counted worthy of more glory than Moses, inasmuch as he who hath builded the house hath more honour than the house.
items.plainText: For this man was counted worthy of more glory than Moses, inasmuch as he who hath builded the house hath more honour than the house.

items.text: For every house is builded by some man; but he that built all things is God.
items.plainText: For every house is builded by some man; but he that built all things is God.

items.text: And Moses verily was faithful in all his house, as a servant, for a testimony of those things which were to be spoken after;
items.plainText: And Moses verily was faithful in all his house, as a servant, for a testimony of those things which were to be spoken after;

items.text: But Christ as a son over his own house; whose house are we, if we hold fast the confidence and the rejoicing of the hope firm unto the end.
items.plainText: But Christ as a son over his own house; whose house are we, if we hold fast the confidence and the rejoicing of the hope firm unto the end.

items.text: Wherefore (as the Holy Ghost saith, To day if ye will hear his voice,
items.plainText: Wherefore (as the Holy Ghost saith, To day if ye will hear his voice,

items.text: Harden not your hearts, as in the provocation, in the day of temptation in the wilderness:
items.plainText: Harden not your hearts, as in the provocation, in the day of temptation in the wilderness:

items.text: When your fathers tempted me, proved me, and saw my works forty years.
items.plainText: When your fathers tempted me, proved me, and saw my works forty years.

items.text: Wherefore I was grieved with that generation, and said, They do alway err in their heart; and they have not known my ways.
items.plainText: Wherefore I was grieved with that generation, and said, They do alway err in their heart; and they have not known my ways.

items.text: So I sware in my wrath, They shall not enter into my rest.)
items.plainText: So I sware in my wrath, They shall not enter into my rest.)

items.text: Take heed, brethren, lest there be in any of you an evil heart of unbelief, in departing from the living God.
items.plainText: Take heed, brethren, lest there be in any of you an evil heart of unbelief, in departing from the living God.

items.text: But exhort one another daily, while it is called To day; lest any of you be hardened through the deceitfulness of sin.
items.plainText: But exhort one another daily, while it is called To day; lest any of you be hardened through the deceitfulness of sin.

items.text: For we are made partakers of Christ, if we hold the beginning of our confidence stedfast unto the end;
items.plainText: For we are made partakers of Christ, if we hold the beginning of our confidence stedfast unto the end;

items.text: While it is said, To day if ye will hear his voice, harden not your hearts, as in the provocation.
items.plainText: While it is said, To day if ye will hear his voice, harden not your hearts, as in the provocation.

items.text: For some, when they had heard, did provoke: howbeit not all that came out of Egypt by Moses.
items.plainText: For some, when they had heard, did provoke: howbeit not all that came out of Egypt by Moses.

items.text: But with whom was he grieved forty years? was it not with them that had sinned, whose carcases fell in the wilderness?
items.plainText: But with whom was he grieved forty years? was it not with them that had sinned, whose carcases fell in the wilderness?

items.text: And to whom sware he that they should not enter into his rest, but to them that believed not?
items.plainText: And to whom sware he that they should not enter into his rest, but to them that believed not?

items.text: So we see that they could not enter in because of unbelief.
items.plainText: So we see that they could not enter in because of unbelief.
